data.text: @NathaliaVasquez It could had been a little bit better at some aspects but it's a definite watch given the likeness to real life events from Dilma's tenure. It would match Narcos' fame in coming seasons.
@HeyShahRukh I've heard great things about The Mechanism too! Let me know if you like it! :)

@NathaliaVasquez Yea, Downtown Abbey is a good watch, it has beautiful arc for some characters and story maturity but you should had done it before The Crown. I am currently watching and enjoying The Mechanism from Brazil and Sacred Games from India. Netflix international content is epic!

@HeyShahRukh I want to watch Downtown Abbey too, have you seen it? Netflix has been releasing some amazing series in Spanish; nothing to do with politics, but I was totally hooked on Money Heist before and now on Luís Miguel! They’re so good!
@NathaliaVasquez Yes! It has been the most remarkable experience so far. Helena Bonham will slay!
@HeyShahRukh I looooooove The Crown! Can’t wait for season 3!
